patchServerData

public ResponseData patchServerData(boolean synchronous,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> resultClass,
                                    java.lang.Object tag,
                                    AbstractBaseDrupalEntity.OnEntityRequestListener listener)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Parameters:
synchronous - if true - request will be performed synchronously.
resultClass - class of result or null if no result needed.
tag - Object tag, passer to listener after request was finished or failed because of exception
listener -
Returns:
@class ResponseData entity, containing server response and resultClass instance or error in case of synchronous request, null otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case if there are no changes to post. You can check if there are ones, calling isModified() method.
